resources.string: By using NetGuard, you agree to the GNU General Public License version 3

Great care has been taken to develop and test NetGuard, however it is impossible to guarantee it will work correctly on every device. NetGuard is known to crash when activated on some devices. It is also known to block all traffic on some other devices. These issues are caused by bugs in Android, or in the software provided by the manufacturer, so please don\'t blame NetGuard. \n\nBy using NetGuard, you agree to the GNU General Public License version 3
Define rules for system applications (for experts)
Display the network type and if the network is metered in the action bar
넷가드가 해제되어 있습니다. 상단 스위치를 사용해 넷가드를 활성화하세요.
NetGuard uses a local VPN as a sinkhole to block internet traffic. For this reason, please allow a VPN connection in the next dialog
